StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMedicalStatusWaiversDates]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [ANNUAL_CERT_1], 106), null) AS ANNUAL_CERT_1, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [ANNUAL_CERT_2], 106), null) AS ANNUAL_CERT_2, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [ANNUAL_CERT_3], 106), null) AS ANNUAL_CERT_3, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [ANNUAL_CERT_4], 106), null) AS ANNUAL_CERT_4, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [HIV_DATE], 106), null) AS HIV_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [PAP_DATE], 106), null) AS PAP_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [FLIGHT_PE_DATE], 106), null) AS FLIGHT_PE_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_PLACED_NOE], 106), null) AS DATE_PLACED_NOE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_RELEASED_NOE], 106), null) AS DATE_RELEASED_NOE FROM [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_DATES] WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NWAID
